summary: Current water quality is stable but shows slight fluctuations in pH and TDS. Monitor closely.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 6.8-7.2 for optimal tilapia health.
Ensure TDS remains within 300-500 ppm for plant growth.
Keep temperature between 24-28°C for tilapia and plant health.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 326.828 / 303.9 / 332.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.38 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
